eu.sapere.middleware.node.networking.physical.bluetooth
Class BtDeviceDiscovery

java.lang.Object
  eu.sapere.middleware.node.networking.physical.bluetooth.BtDeviceDiscovery

public class BtDeviceDiscovery
extends Object

The BtDeviceDiscovery is an service managing Bluetooth connectivity through Bluecove library (http://bluecove.org/). Given device Bluetooth limitations, it opens and manages only one BT socket at time.

Discovering follows three main phases:

  • Enumerates visible BT devices and asks for pairing.

  • For each visible and paired device asks for available services.

  • If Sapere service is available starts a ClientConnEstab thread making Sapere devices to exchange middleware parameters.

    Author:
    Alberto Rosi (UNIMORE)

    startDiscovery

    public void startDiscovery()
    Starts Bluetooth deviced discovery and defines behaviors for DiscoveryListener events. If servicesDiscovered retrieves an active Sapere Service on the remote device a ClientConnEstab thread is started.
